message: We finally stop to check the area.
I don't hear footsteps behind us anymore. Have we lost them?
Koujaku and I find a wall to lean against and catch our breath. I feel like my lungs might burst.
Just as I'm starting to feel like I can breathe again, my Coil beeps.

name: ベニ
message: "Ain't that the same thing Aoba got?"

name: 紅雀
message: "What kind of sorry excuse for a game is this? You can't even do anything."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Is this the first time you've gotten it?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I told you about it, remember? How I got some weird game that just played itself."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So, like, do you think we can get into Platinum Jail with the invitation at the end?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Invitation? I didn't get anything like that in mine."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I can't help but think that this game predicted Granny's kidnapping."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, but right after I got the game, pretty much exactly the same thing happened in real life."

name: 紅雀
message: "...Alright. So what do you think it's trying to tell you this time?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "A cave, a treasure chest, a key, and a door..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Well, forget about the game for now. That invitation, though; that might be for real. Maybe it really will get you into Platinum Jail."
My Coil beeps again. This time, it's a message.
There's an image attached. A map of the Old Residential District.
A spot is marked in red on the left edge of the wall surrounding Platinum Jail.

name: 蒼葉
message: "We need to meet up with Mr. Haga. Let's get going."
